      • train

        public void train(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix x,
         org.jblas.DoubleMatrix y,
         double lr)
        Train on the given inputs and labels. This will assign the passed in values as fields to this logistic function for caching.
        Parameters:
        x - the inputs to train on
        y - the labels to train on
        lr - the learning rate

      • predict

        public org.jblas.DoubleMatrix predict(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix x)
        Classify input
        Parameters:
        x - the input (can either be a matrix or vector) If it's a matrix, each row is considered an example and associated rows are classified accordingly. Each row will be the likelihood of a label given that example
        Returns:
        a probability distribution for each row
